item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: <p>It does not work for articulation and is known as developmental verbal dyspraxia. A new hypothesis - perhaps all you bright graduates are closet dyspraxics??!! I spend a lot of my working life trying to correct this!!</p>
item.content:encoded: It does not work for articulation and is known as developmental verbal dyspraxia. A new hypothesis – perhaps all you bright graduates are closet dyspraxics??!! I spend a lot of my working life trying to correct this!!

item.title: By: Fiona
item.dc:creator: Fiona
item.description: <p>Hi Mtat, i had seen tihs bforee but am slitl azemad by it. V cool. Smhae it deosn't wrok for fgeiorn lgunaegs.</p>
